reviews.review: great game

One of the few times where I actually laughed while playing a game. The puzzles are fun, the graphics and animation impressive (considering it's a Source game) but what really takes the cake (the cake hurr) here is the much more fleshed out world. Fascinating stuff.

It's a remarkable game.

If you like puzzles and brain teasers you'll definitely like Portal. This second version is a moden classic. More elaborate world, more elaborate story, more interactions with the world than just opening portals (making for complex puzzles), but equally fun and funny! And, add to that, a very interesting co-op mode.

Esto, señores, esto es una secuela como Dios manda. Fiel a sus orígenes, fiel a su filosofía, sigue siendo completamente único.

Dosis de humor, sumadas a puzzles muy ingeniosos, un doblaje al español excelente, un diseño artístico sobresaliente y un transfondo y argumento brutal sumado a la saga Half-Life.

Un must have en mi opinión para la gente que quiera una aventura en primera persona fresca, novedosa y que corrige casi todos los fallos de la primera parte.
Play story, play co-op, play maps... Make your own too. The story was actually really fun, and I'm having a fun time making my own maps as well. :)

Great! Awesome multiplayer. Completed the game in co-op with Grom4ik and she is not a player at all. That means something)) She loved puzzles and adorable robot characters, hi-fives and synchronous actions.
Top 3 games of all time on my list. Didn't play it? You're missing out.
One of the best games ever!!!

Dieses Spiel ist in meinen Augen ein "must-have"! Einfach richtig gut gemacht mit einigen Passagen, bei denen man schon etwas mehr nachdenken muss. Umso größer ist die Freude, wenn man diese Level gemeistert hat. Ein tolles Koop-Spiel!

Brilliant, fantastic, amazing, unbelievable, phenomenal, wonderful, astonishing, astounding, marvelous, incredible, stupendous, miraculous, fascinating...
AWESOME
Fun but challenging puzzle game. Good storyline, hard puzzles, and then there's Wheatley...

Oh yes! This is the first game I've 100% beat in a while. The puzzles may look a bit abstract, but once you figure it out you get a true sense of accomplishment. I finished the single player campaign in 7-8 hours. I'm a little sad that it's over. The story was great, I wasn't expecting that. I just wish I had a friend to do Co-op with. . .

パズル好きならやって損はなし！非常に奥深いパズルFPS
メインのスト－リーモードの他に、チェンバーを自作したり、他人が作ったチェンバーをプレイすることもできるため末永く遊べます
ただ3D酔い持ちの人は激しく酔う可能性もあるので体調と要相談
Certainly not a lemon, that's for sure! Great story, awesome characters, and more of that good ol' high velocity portal flinging that we know and love.
Everyone needs this game.

I was sceptical when I first heard of the "gels" they were going to introduce in Portal 2. It seemed like a desperate attempt to justify releasing a second Portal game. But who would've thought, it actually works. They also expanded on the narrative, so you're in for a treat once again.

Hay juegos que deberían estar preinstalados en los equipos. Portal 2 es uno de ellos. Un juego de puzzles, en primera persona, que destila humor ácido por los cuatro costados y que deja a su (breve) antecesor como un mero prólogo. Otra obra maestra más de Valve.
I played Portal I first. As soon as I heard about Portal 2 I downloaded it. It is one of my favorite games. I really love the puzzle aspect of it.
It still stays one of the best pc games  ever released, I'll keep returning to this masterpiece no matter the time.
Awesome
Best puzzle game I've played - acting and storyline is quality and ending is great.

Good 3D first-person puzzle fun with some nice mental challenges requiring some lateral thinking. It is really satisfying to just load up one community-made map (of which there are 20000+ maps) and play it through. It really makes you examine everything logically about each puzzle and (sometimes) to think outside the box.

Un jeux d'un humour fou,on en apprends un peu plus sur l'univers de Black Mesa,un gameplay renové pour plus de plaisir,le Saint-Graal est enfin la ! Le co-op rajoute des heures et des heures d'amusement ! Pour tout les fans d'humour et de challenges qui renversent la tete Mw'hahahahaha :)
Very well made game, lots of strategy involved.

Portal 2, now with twice as much portally goodness.* The voice acting is excellent, the story is pretty neat. Overall, it's like Portal, only better. My only quibble with the game is a few puzzles where the solution is to hunt around until you find the only piece of wall that a portal will stick to... which is more irritating than anything, I thought. Also, there's one puzzle that even after two playthroughs, I still don't know how it's supposed to be beaten (I just did stuff until I got past it).

*May not contain exactly twice as many portals as Portal. I didn't count.
Hella fun game! :D Very addicting and has lots of varations in game play to keep things fresh. Highly recommended. =]
GLaDOS just got meaner.
A fantastic game, highly recommended. 9.5/10
puzzles.

There's a limited number of hours of gameplay for the single player campaign, but they've added the ability for 2 players to play co-op, and to make your own maps as well as download other people's to try. If none of this interests you, the ending is reason enough to get this game. I won't spoil anything, but... wow. The entire game is just one epic adventure which leads to a very climactic ending! It's not without its eastereggs, of course. Like just about everything Valve makes, you can expect thought and quality to be put into this.

Bon et bien voilà, j'ai finit portal 2 ... que dire ... bah ... franchement hein ... il est bien, y a que sur la toute fin avec le ... truc ... rose où je me suis un peu arraché les cheveux lol mais sinon c'est bien construit niveau puzzle et tout, c'est vraiment cool, j'ai vraiment accroché ! je le recommande a tout ceux qui veulent se triturer un peu les méninges sans de trop grosses prises de tête avec une bonne dose d'humour ^^
One of the best games I've ever played.
Very entertaining! Some of the levels are a bit difficult. But it is a good game and you should go buy it :D

Great sequel. It has more character development and you will always remember them. Now you can create your own chambers and play them co-op. Oh, and also has HATS!!!!

Portal 2 est pour moi le maître des puzzle game à la 1ère personne. L'humour, le gameplay, le système des portails juste jouissif... 

Tous les éléments sont réunis pour faire de Portal 2 un jeu exceptionnel sur lequel j'y reviens régulièrement juste pour le plaisir de refaire le jeu encore et encore. Je le connais par coeur, mais j'y reviens toujours avec le même plaisir qu'à la découverte et ça, c'est très rare chez moi.

Vous pouvez l'acheter les yeux fermés.
Awesome!

突破以往的遊戲，不同於傳統的益智遊戲
有劇情深度，難度適中的謎題，單純讓玩家享受於遊戲中

Won Game of the Year 2011 on my blog, Choicest Games. What's great about Portal 2 (and its predecessor) is that it's a breath of fresh air in the games industry. It dares to break the mould and not simply be another cookie-cutter clone of Modern Warfare, GTA, etc. Portal 2 just took everything that was great about the original, it's humour and devious physics puzzles, and made it bigger and better. This game is definitely one to try for those who have become disillusioned with the games industry. It might just suck you back in!
Good for any puzzle player. Highly recommended

Portal 2 is one of the most creative and original games I have ever played. The combination of hilarious comedy and brain-frying puzzles really makes an awesome game. This game keeps you coming back with loads of content and things to do: making your own tests; competing with players worldwide for fastest times; and there is more than enough community made tests to keep you going for a life-time. Really enjoyed this game,

10 out of 10.
u can go away
Portal 2!! Play with a friend or build your own puzzles! Its great!

Эта игра должна быть у каждого пользователя Steam. Игра шедевральна и после прохождения сюжетной линии вы не захотите с ней расстоваться и тут Valve даёт вам возможность вернуться в неё в режиме Co-op. Это лучшее во что я играл за последнее время и эту игру я смело могу поставить на вершину олимпа!!!

[h1]ЛИЦЕНЗИОННАЯ ЖИЗНЬ ЮДЖИНА МОРРА[/h1]

Portal 2 стал моей первой купленной игрой в Стиме. До этого прошел её на пиратке. И она прекрасна.
Сюжет,персонажи,уровни. Всё сделано на высшем уровне, что не удивительно. Это же Valve. 
Старенький Source удивил не на шутку. Графика и сейчас смотрится отлично.
Музыка великолепна. Жаль что её написал не Келли Бэйли. Но Майк Мораски справился на отлично.
И признаюсь честно, редактор тестовых камер - это то, о чём я мечтал со времён первой части. Она ещё на долго продлит жизнь игре. 
В мультиплеер поиграл хоть и не много, но он очень мне понравился.

Последняя на данный момент одиночная игра от Valve.
good shit, realy good stuff.

文句なしの良ゲー。１と２一気にクリアしてしまうほど楽しめた。
気になったら買ってまず損することはないでしょう。その時はぜひ１と２両方で。
パズルを解きつつGLaDOSちゃんの可愛さに癒されましょう。

Both singleplayer and co-op are amazingly fun, Hours of entertainment.

I had a blast with this game, Hopefully you will too. One of the best 3D puzzle games i've seen.

If you haven't played Portal, you need to play Portal. Everyone needs to play Portal.

It is really fun and definately longer than portal 1. I like this more than portal because you're not constrained in a factory the whole time and the puzzles can get intense. The storyline is also pretty good in this one it definately fills in some gaps portal may have left. I was really disappointed that there were not many half life 3 hints in this and also the co-op is rather quick to beat. It is. This engine however is getting real old , Valve has to make some major graphical and gameplay improvements Still worth it now, as long as you didn't pay $30+ for it then you will get your money's worth.
I still can't get bored of this game. It does everything I want in a video game and more. Puzzles, humor, story, just everything.
Even better than the Xbox 360 version. Deffo worth a buy. P:

Portal 2 offers both coop and singleplayer campaignes. Both of which are very immersive and challenging, the further into the story you go, the more challenging the game will become. I really liked it, it offered a wonderful story and some really good humor.

Para terminar de hacer un juegazo, un modo co-operativo aparte del modo historia. Muy muy recomendable.

A Great First Person/Action/Adventure and Puzzler Game. I Highly Recommend playing this with a couple of friends!

I fucking HATE puzzle games. The writing in this one is so damn good, that I just forged on, using a walkthrough, hating every second of it's nerdy gameplay just to see more of that brilliant, dark-hearted humor that's about two million light years ahead of the competition. Also, the ending is pure brilliance.

The voice-acting, the comedy, the drama.. not to mention the fantastic portal-based puzzle gameplay.. GOTY 2011.

An absolute must have!
An interactive physics class. Loads of fun on coop.

With such a large marketing push and glowing reviews (critics and users alike) all over the net, I honestly don't need to say anything you've heard a dozen times over already.

However, since its initial release there was a map editor released, and just recently Valve added co-op support for that map editor. So there is now, potentially, an infinite number of co-op maps for you and a friend to play. "Continue testing," says GLaDOS.

I originally played it on the X-box 360, but picked it up on Steam again because of the new player-generated content, and there are some pretty good puzzles out there.

Thanks to Richard for sending me a -75% coupon for this title, btw. (A lot of people have those floating in their steam Inventory, so ask around if you want to purchase this game.)
Hilarious, and effectively two games in one - one as single player, and one as multiplayer.  Pure genius.
Sublime, después de Portal, la secuela es genial, modo multijugador muy entretenido y muy buena historia :3
